thread.section_title: One.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of One.com | www.one.com | 2 of 216
thread.title: K

author: K
title: K
text:
I would like to thank "Christian" who assisted me in the cancellation of the domains subscribed to One.com. It turned out that my subscription was automatically renewed, and Christian was very helpful to waive all the fees.
Suggestion:
I would like to suggest One.com to exclude an 'automatic renewal' for the domains created and instead, send a reminder email or post a letter to the domain holder once the renewal is due to avoid any "surprise fees" like my one.
